name: U.S. SUGAR CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Monitor all issues relating to the domestic sugar industry with an emphasis on maintaining U.S. sugar policy, including: reauthorization of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (P.L.113-79), administration of the commodity program for sugar under the Agricultural Act of 2014 (P.L.113-79), FY2019 Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations, hurricane relief, H.R.4, FAA Reauthorization Act of 2018, and H.R.2, Agriculture and Nutrition Act of 2018.
Legislative issues related to tax reform.

Monitor all issues relating to the domestic sugar industry with an emphasis on maintaining U.S. sugar policy, including administration of the commodity program for sugar and hurricane relief. 
H.R.3164/S.2522, Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2020 and H.R.3055, the FY2020 Consolidated measure.
Implementation of FAA Reauthorization Act of 2018 (P.L.115-254).
Implementation of Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 (P.L.115-334).
H.R.3324, Prioritizing Revised Operations To Eliminate Cyanobacteria Toxins in Florida Act.
H.R.977, Toxic Health Threat Warning Act of 2019.
H.R.335, South Florida Clean Coastal Waters Act of 2019.
H.R.3705, SWEET Act.
